body:
Malik_Novak, 
Same here, I'm loving these comics so far. I hope someone gets a round to translating them.
Hope it comes out in English soon.
Those hands are drawn quite nicely..

"so asslicker with the authors" no it's because they actually make quality stuff, how do you not see the quality in those sex positions? Just look at a page of Konnyaku or Aian, they literally look stunning outside the semi mosiac censorship, also @Efeoyay that's Tsun he's trash I agree, I kinda agree about Midoriiro's part being kinda lifeless his art is for pretty niche readers but I find it to be ok though not the best part here but still far from the worst.
"Hell naw"  its not my fault you act so asslicker with the authors
Pretty good. Aian great as always but who did the one after Chinzurena? This drawing is just straight garbage. The ones after that are good again. The last one just looks pretty "lifeless", too grey.

"they are scarce" Hell naw, that's just some of em (specifically Chin and Tsun), most of the stuff here are consistent, sure the length of some parts are short but they did a great job of giving enough content, and portraying what is to be portrayed.
some parts are good, but they are scarce...too bad...

Well as for the rest, pretty good job, I am especially impressed by Akai Yoru's part, I love the way Akai draws hair especially with the boy's black hair it felt distinct and cute, too lazy to write about the entire thing right now so I'll probably do it later, but I'd basically rank the artists and their parts in the anthology like this: Magifuro Konnyaku > Akai Yoru > Shotaian > Erutasuku > Sioyaki Ayu > Mareo > Midoriiro > Takayamanon > Chinzurena > Tsun ( This artist draws whack shit that looks way more cartoony than Chinzurena's shit) Overall I'd give this anthology an 8/10

I'm pretty impressed that the people behind these "Tama" anthologies have slightly learned their lesson of not over doing the censorship, I can finally indulge into the greatness of what they publish, if you were to ask me who the best is on the anthology it is obviously Magifuro Konnyaku, Nabe literally gave me what I wanted: Fantastic sex angles, Cute ass traps, A place fit for sex and enough intense scenes that make me feel like I'd nut all day, plus the fact that genitalia is way more visible now just makes me aroused even more, the biggest mistake "Tama" doujins did before was to literally abuse censorship to death that it felt like I was fapping to a rock lol, I'd my favorite Trap artist an obvious 10 on his part here, it literally destroyed the rest of the artists here.
Rest in peace Anthology, you got killed by Magifuro Konnyaku
Looks I finally got what I wanted!!!!!
this better get translated soon man
